sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_431105_cand_ass_question_library"> <x_431105_cand_ass_question_library action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <answers>Tell them that you feel they are being unreasonable and that you are no longer willing to do their work for them.
MOSTEFFECTIVE | LEAST EFFECTIVE Challenge them about their behaviour and ask why they need your help.
MOSTEFFECTIVE | LEAST EFFECTIVE Speak to your manager about the situation and get them to intervene.
MOSTEFFECTIVE | LEAST EFFECTIVE Focus on delivering your work and just ignore any work they try to give you.
MOSTEFFECTIVE | LEAST EFFECTIVE</answers> <assessment_state display_value="Preselection CBT">5165ad5897442110a4deb9dfe153af6f</assessment_state> <correct_answer>Challenge them about their behaviour and ask why they need your help.
MOSTEFFECTIVE | LEAST EFFECTIVE</correct_answer> <default_max_value>11</default_max_value> <number>QLB0001017</number> <question>A colleague keeps asking you to help them out and delegating their work to you. You are struggling to fit in this additional workload and feel that they are being unreasonable.
Please consider the situation and then select which statement you feel is the most effective and the least effective response or action from the four statements.</question> <selection_criteria display_value="Situational Judgement (SJT)">d24e91d097442110a4deb9dfe153af4c</selection_criteria> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-12-24 14:56:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e5b07d9497842110a4deb9dfe153af44</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-12-25 06:44:32</sys_updated_on> </x_431105_cand_ass_question_library> </record_update>
